LanguageData.DecPerc.Name: Configurable Deconstruct Percentage
LanguageData.DecPerc.RestartNReq: Restart NOT required for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.DecPerc.DeconstructPercent_Tip: {0}% of the material will be returned upon deconstruction. If the result is not a whole number, it will be randomly rounded up or down.
LanguageData.DecPerc.FailReturnPercent_Tip: When a consturction task fails, {0}% of the material will be returned. If the result is not a whole number, it will be randomly rounded up or down.
LanguageData.DecPerc.DestroyReturnPercent_Tip: When a building is violently destroyed, {0}% of the material will be returned. If the result is not a whole number, it will be randomly rounded up or down. However, some buildings (such as walls) are marked by Vanilla to not return materials.
LanguageData.DecPerc.CancelBuildingPercent_Tip: When a building frame is cancelled, {0}% of the material will be returned. If the result is not a whole number, it will be randomly rounded up or down.
LanguageData.DecPerc.CancelUnfinishedPercent_Tip: When an unfinished worktable item (such as an in-progress sculpture or weapon) is cancelled, {0}% of the material will be returned. If the result is not a whole number, it will be randomly rounded up or down.
LanguageData.DecPerc.MinimumReturn: Return at least {0} of each resource
LanguageData.DecPerc.MinimumReturn_Tip: Will try to return at least {0} unit of each resource. This will never return more than 100% of the initial material.
